name: Shamail-e-Tirmidhi - Arabic with Urdu Translation
description: Shamail-e-Tirmidhi - Arabic with Urdu and English Translation.  App Features:  Complete Shamail-e-Tirmidhi Beautiful User Interface Easy Navigation Customize-able Font Arabic, Urdu and English Fonts Go to Last Read Hadith Quick Jump to Hadith Number Various Color Themes Share Hadith Unlimited Bookmarks  Do read and benefit from this app insha Allah and help us spread the message of Islam to as many people as possible.  Also, do give your feedback about the app.  Jazk Allhu Khayran
